title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0001
text: What is the primary purpose of the API Composition pattern in microservices?

options.text: To aggregate data from multiple services into a single API response

explanation: The API Composition pattern aggregates data from multiple microservices into a single, unified API response.

title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0002
text: Which of the following best describes the API Composition pattern?

options.text: A service composes responses by calling multiple backend services
A service stores all data in a shared database
A service communicates only through events
A service uses a message broker for all requests

explanation: In API Composition, a service or gateway composes responses by calling multiple backend services.

title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0003
text: What problem does the API Composition pattern solve?

options.text: Combining data from multiple microservices for client consumption

explanation: API Composition solves the problem of combining data from multiple microservices into a single response for clients.

title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0004
text: Which component typically performs API composition?
explanation: An API Gateway or Aggregator Service typically performs API composition by calling multiple backend services.

title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0005
text: Which of the following is a key benefit of API Composition?

options.text: Simplifies client interactions by providing a unified API
Eliminates the need for backend services

explanation: API Composition simplifies client interactions by aggregating data from multiple services into a unified API.

title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0006
text: Which of the following is a common challenge in API Composition?

options.text: Handling partial failures from backend services

explanation: Handling partial failures from backend services is a common challenge in API Composition.

title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0007
text: Which of the following is a benefit of API Composition for clients?

options.text: Reduces the number of client-to-service calls
Requires clients to call each service directly

explanation: API Composition reduces the number of client-to-service calls by aggregating data in one response.

title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0008
text: Which of the following is a disadvantage of API Composition?

options.text: Increased latency due to multiple backend calls

explanation: API Composition can increase latency because it requires multiple backend calls to compose a response.

title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0009
text: Which of the following is a common strategy to improve performance in API Composition?
explanation: Parallel calls to backend services can improve performance in API Composition by reducing total response time.

title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0010
text: Which of the following is a common tool used for API Composition?
explanation: GraphQL is often used for API Composition because it allows clients to query and aggregate data from multiple sources.

title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0011
text: Which of the following is a benefit of API Composition for maintainability?

options.text: Encapsulates data aggregation logic in one place

explanation: API Composition encapsulates data aggregation logic in one place, improving maintainability.

title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0012
text: Which of the following is a common failure handling technique in API Composition?
explanation: The Circuit Breaker pattern is commonly used in API Composition to handle backend service failures gracefully.

title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0013
text: Which of the following is a benefit of API Composition for flexibility?

options.text: Allows combining data from heterogeneous services

explanation: API Composition allows combining data from heterogeneous services, providing flexibility in data aggregation.

title: MicroservicesServiceCollaborationAPIComposition - Q0014
text: Which of the following is a disadvantage of API Composition for scalability?

options.text: The aggregator can become a bottleneck

explanation: The aggregator in API Composition can become a bottleneck if not properly scaled.
